__TOC__


content of <code>/etc/chatscripts/BluetoothDialup</code> :
<pre>
TIMEOUT 35
ECHO    ON
ABORT   '\nBUSY\r'
ABORT   '\nERROR\r'
ABORT   '\nNO ANSWER\r'
ABORT   '\nNO CARRIER\r'
ABORT   '\nNO DIALTONE\r'
ABORT   '\nRINGING\r\n\r\nRINGING\r'
''      \rAT
OK      'AT+CGDCONT=2,"IP","internet"'
OK      ATD*99#
CONNECT ""
</pre>

no username/pass, <code>/etc/ppp/peers/BluetoothDialup</code> file content in accordance with the main BluetoothDialup article.

Tested on Nokia E51. If it's not working on your phone you may try changing <code>AT+CGDCONT=2</code> to <code>AT+CGDCONT=1</code>
